text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus parvisquamulosus is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description:
The cap is 5 to 9 centimetres (2.0 to 3.5 in) in diameter.
Microscopic characteristics
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus parvisquamulosus grows in groups on conifer logs. It has been found in California and Maine, between June and August.
